entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
